parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.94</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Arguments in MP</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Effects in MP</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a weapon into cargo space of a vehicle / box with given attachments / magazines. Ignores available cargo space. If the weapon class has any pre-attached items (LinkedItems), they are removed and new items, supplied via command arguments, are added.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command has [[local]] effect; for a global variant, see [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargoGlobal]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> container [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[weapon, muzzle, flashlight, optics, [primaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount], [secondaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount], bipod], weaponsCount] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> container: [[Object]] - Container to add the weapon to, might be backpack, ammobox or vehicle </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[weapon, muzzle, flashlight, optics, [primaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount], [secondaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount], bipod], weaponsCount]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> [weapon, muzzle, flashlight, optics, [primaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount], [secondaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount], bipod]: [[Array]] in format [[weaponsItems]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - Weapon class name. See the topic [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values </value></part><part><name>Parameter 4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> muzzle: [[String]] - Muzzle attachment class name or "" if not needed </value></part><part><name>Parameter 5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> flashlight: [[String]] - Side rail attachment class name or "" if not needed </value></part><part><name>Parameter 6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> optics: [[String]] - Top rail attachment class name or "" if not needed </value></part><part><name>Parameter 7</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p8</name>=<value> [primaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount]: [[Array]] - Primary muzzle magazine info or [] if not needed</value></part><part><name>Parameter 8</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p9</name>=<value> primaryMuzzleMagazine: [[String]] - Magazine class name </value></part><part><name>Parameter 9</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p10</name>=<value> ammoCount: [[Number]] - Ammo count in magazine (will be clipped in 0 and max mag capacity range) </value></part><part><name>Parameter 10</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p11</name>=<value> [secondaryMuzzleMagazine, ammoCount]: [[Array]] - Secondary muzzle magazine info or [] if not needed</value></part><part><name>Parameter 11</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p12</name>=<value> secondaryMuzzleMagazine: [[String]] - Magazine class name </value></part><part><name>Parameter 12</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p13</name>=<value> ammoCount: [[Number]] - Ammo count in magazine (will be clipped in 0 and max mag capacity range)</value></part><part><name>Parameter 13</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p14</name>=<value> bipod: [[String]] - Underbarrel rail attachment class name or "" if not needed </value></part><part><name>Parameter 14</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p15</name>=<value> weaponsCount: [[Number]] - Number of weapons to add </value></part><part><name>Parameter 15</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return Value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[cursorObject]] [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["arifle_MX_GL_F", "muzzle_snds_H", "", "optic_aco", ["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag", 15], ["3Rnd_HE_Grenade_shell", 2], ""], 2];
</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Add five MX GL rifles with flashlight side attachment and a full 30 rounds magazine loaded into the gun, and full 3Rnd HE grenade magazine loaded into the grenade launcher:
<code>[[cursorObject]] [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["arifle_MX_GL_F", "", "acc_flashlight", "", ["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag", 30], ["3Rnd_HE_Grenade_shell", 2], ""], 5]</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Add one MX rifle without any attachments or magazines event though the class has linked items:
<code>[[cursorObject]] [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>["arifle_MX_Holo_pointer_F", "", "", "", [], [], ""], 1];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Add all weapons on player with attachments:
<code>{ [[cursorObject]] [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargo]] [_x, 1] } [[forEach]] [[weaponsItems]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[weaponsItems]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[getWeaponCargo]], [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargoGlobal]] </value></part><part><name>See Also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 28, 2020 - 21:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Andrew_S90|Andrew_S90]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command also allows you to add a weapon with attachments directly to the players backpack.
<code>(backpackContainer player) addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargo [ ["arifle_MX_F","muzzle_snds_H","acc_pointer_IR","optic_Hamr",["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",30],[],"bipod_03_F_blk"], 1];</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
